content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case employee leaves the company, his/her Resource Manager should initiate (submit) Dismissal Request in UPSA in terms of each responsible services will perform all the needed actions to make sure that employee received compensation for unused VACs, OVTs, made a written statement, etc. For each employment type, dismissal type and location there is own set of dismissal items to be approved.
